channel.title: Murion [666]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]https://murion.org/forums/public/style_images/4_logo.png[/img]
Murion has decided to open it's doors to the public with a beta environment as a tool to allow us to transition smoothly into the full public release following imminently. The game world type is currently [b]spawn*[/b] with very little restriction allocated on a game profile (which would normally be in place). Register with us on the [URL=https://www.murion.org/forums]forums[/URL] and become part of the community where you may place suggestions, converse and help improve the game.
[b][SIZE=4]Links:[/SIZE][/b] • [URL=https://www.murion.org]Website[/URL] • [URL=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-ytw_MqRXeVGHhVtsrXftA]Youtube[/URL]
[b][SIZE=4]How to get started:[/SIZE][/b] You will need an active account registered on our [URL=https://www.murion.org]website[/URL] in order to be able to login to the game with the same credentials.
[URL=https://www.murion.org][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VmMNQrT.png[/img][/URL]
[spoiler="Extended Media"] [video=youtube;Fzdojr2mc4M]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fzdojr2mc4M[/video] [/spoiler]
[spoiler="Hosting"] CPU: Xeon Quad Core 3.6 GHz RAM: 16GB HDD: 3x SSD disks (RAID 1, with a separate backup) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Uhtem1.png[/img] [/spoiler] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kHpR8NY.jpg[/img]
[i]*Some items may be restricted as they may be flagged as adminstrator only.[/i] [/center]

item.title: Murion [666]
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[center]

Murion has decided to open it’s doors to the public with a beta environment as a tool to allow us to transition smoothly into the full public release following imminently. The game world type is currently spawn* with very little restriction allocated on a game profile (which would normally be in place). Register with us on the [URL=https://www.murion.org/forums]forums[/URL] and become part of the community where you may place suggestions, converse and help improve the game.

[SIZE=4]Links:[/SIZE]
• [URL=https://www.murion.org]Website[/URL]
• [URL=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-ytw_MqRXeVGHhVtsrXftA]Youtube[/URL]

[SIZE=4]How to get started:[/SIZE]
You will need an active account registered on our [URL=https://www.murion.org]website[/URL] in order to be able to login to the game with the same credentials.

[URL=https://www.murion.org][/URL]

[spoiler=“Extended Media”]
[video=youtube;Fzdojr2mc4M]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fzdojr2mc4M[/video]
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=“Hosting”]
CPU: Xeon Quad Core 3.6 GHz
RAM: 16GB
HDD: 3x SSD disks (RAID 1, with a separate backup)

[/spoiler]

*Some items may be restricted as they may be flagged as adminstrator only.
[/center]

Read full topic
